changeSet.author: jkakkad
changeSet.comment: KPME-2844:Split "View KPME Record" into separate permissions for each KPME module

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.valueComputed: (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM KRIM_ROLE_T WHERE NMSPC_CD = 'KPME-LM' AND ROLE_NM = 'Leave System Administrator')
